ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s perhaps fair to say that they got the general document oriented, asynch queue bit more or less right, but botched the mapping to the Web. I don t

I think it's perhaps fair to say that they got the general document
oriented, asynch queue bit more or less right, but botched the mapping
to the Web.

I don't know why they didn't just use mod-pubsub.

Mark.
